ygData.subject: Re: Playing Where's Waldo in Shar Vahl
ygData.msgSnippet: You wouldn t believe the number of people who have asked for help finding the Registrar in Shar Vahl. It s hard to explain where she is, but I will try. Lets
ygData.messageBody:
You wouldn't believe the number of people who have asked for help finding
the Registrar in Shar Vahl. It's hard to explain where she is, but I will
try. Lets start with the bridge that leads to the thicket zone, not the
hollow... there are two bridges. Standing on the bridge to the thicket, run
into the city. Pass the black female vender - do NOT turn left or right, go
straight past her. Then turn right. There is a little passage that looks
like a tunnel. Go through that. You will then turn up in a little market
square. The Registrar is in one of the rooms in the square. I know it's
confusing, but that is the best way I can explain it. Let me know if you
need any more help.

As for my favorite race and class to play... well, my main is a druid, but I
like to do a little fighting as well. I am also fond of pets and being able
to turn myself into another form. Because there is no class that does all of
that, I can't say I have a favorite. I enjoy my beastlord though. I can't
say what my favorite race is either... halflings are adorable, but I also
like Vah Shirs. However, I can't wait for Frogloks to come out!

-= Mippon - Level 40 Halfling Druid =-
-= Nevfalath - Level 8 Dark Elf Necromancer =-
-= Areznia - Level 7 Vah Shir Beastlord =-
